name: Commando Adventure Shooting Action
description:
***Fight for life in a combat as frontline commando with realistic shooting guns***

Commando adventure shooting is free ios offline first person shooting fighting action game that is all about shooting and survival with your strategy. Stunning game graphics and smooth game play will take you to real life battle zone. Your gunship helicopter was taken down by missile fired by enemies. If you've quick reflexes and excellent aiming and shooting skills then find your way out of enemy’s army place. You are equipped with advanced weapons assault rifles, machine guns and sniper gun. Use these guns to become an assassin shooter and war hero champion for your own country. Death and Danger is on every footstep. Attack sniper shooter enemies with care else one sniper bullet hit and you are gone. Thrilling mission based game with modern combat warzones.
How to play:
- Move commando by virtual joystick, half left side of your apple device is dedicated for moving commando.
- Control aim by touching, half right side of screen is dedicated for aiming of your apple device ipad iphone device.
- Tap Fire button located at right bottom of your ipad iphone devices.
- Press Zoom to take a close look at enemy.
- Tap on gun to switch between guns.
- Tap on map to view satellite view of place.
